content:
Why won't GitHub let me assign @rylev to #80165? They are an org member, so I don't see what the problem is.

cc @Ryan Levick @Mara
maybe it also requires the assignee to have write access to the repo or something?
Strange. I claimed the issue myself and it worked...

It worked with @rustbot claim because I think rustbot will assign itself only if the assignee hasn't commented yet. So when I did it with @rustbot assign it didn't work, but when you claimed it you had already commented (with the claim comment).
But it is weird that GH wouldn't let us assign you.
